Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. It offers exceptional quality and functionality that can truly enhance your experience. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I believe this product could be a valuable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
